attributes.action: Allow the Long Term Sick on Incapacity Benefit to have access to free dental and prescriptions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It seems unfair that those on Jobseekers allowrance (IB) are able to get free NHS help with prescriptions and dental when suffers with chronic conditions like MS, ME, Fibromyalgia, CFS are unable to qualify for assistence. I am a fibromyalgia suffer and I cannot work due to my illness. I have to pay for my dental work which is very hard when I have so little income due to illness.

Please give those on Long Term IB the help we need.
